participant_1.background:
I've worked at my current job for two years, and I still hate popcorn.
i work too many hours in a week.
i am allergic to shellfish and cats.
I'm happy to have met my birth mother, even though it was late in life.
I have been struggling with my mental health recently.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
I do not currently own a home, but I am looking forward to one day having a larp room in my own space.
My dog is a huge source of inspiration and happiness for me, especially when I'm feeling down.
i enjoy taking walks.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.

content.text: I'm glad you're happy to have met your birth mother, even though it was late in life.
Thanks. It was really special. I'm glad I got the chance.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like taking walks, and I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
I love taking walks too. I find them really relaxing.
Me too. They're a great way to clear your head and get some exercise.
I'm allergic to shellfish and cats. Do you have any allergies?
No, I'm lucky in that regard. My dog is a huge source of inspiration and happiness for me, especially when I'm feeling down.
I love dogs! They're such great companions.
Me too. I'm really glad I have mine.
What kind of music do you listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I especially like indie and alternative.
Me too! I love discovering new music.
Me too. It's so much fun to find a new artist that you love.
I'm glad we have so much in common
